# Disclaimer

Thank you for your interest in osu!lazer.

These pre-releases are provided for people interested in following development and getting a sneak-peek at what we're working on. osu!lazer is *not* yet intended to be a playable alternative to [osu-stable](https://osu.ppy.sh). If it doesn't work for you and you are unable to submit a fix, please check back at a later date!

More information is available in the [project readme](https://github.com/ppy/osu). Dev updates are also [posted on my blog](https://blog.ppy.sh).

# known issues
- Audio doesn't pause when pausing or failing during gameplay.

# changes in [osu](https://github.com/ppy/osu)

- Fix osu!direct panel load performance [\#1437](https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/1437) ([peppy](https://github.com/peppy))

- Fix write operations potentially using  other-threaded tracked instances [\#1435](https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/1435) ([peppy](https://github.com/peppy))
- Add missing database indices [\#1434](https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/1434) ([peppy](https://github.com/peppy))
- Remove DatabaseBackedStore Prepare functions [\#1433](https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/1433) ([UselessToucan](https://github.com/UselessToucan))
- Ensure all parsed "Online" IDs are above zero or null [\#1431](https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/1431) ([peppy](https://github.com/peppy))
- Fix import after direct download being scheduled to update thread [\#1429](https://github.com/ppy/osu/pull/1429) ([peppy](https://github.com/peppy))
